title: fsr-c11001-08
text: Number : ............................ Subject : Sabancı University Promotional Program Istanbul, ..../ ......../ 2001 Dear. ............................. ............ Director of National Education Provincial National Education Directorate ........................................... Dear .............., Sabancı University, with modern educational ideals, hopes to be an international university contributing to Turkey's goal in creating an educated nation. In order to interest our nation’s best students, we plan to promote the university by showing them the campus and informing them of the academic programs and scholarship options. We greatfully request your permission to hold promotional talks at the high schools listed on the enclosed form and would be honored to see you at these meetings. We wish you success with your work. Sincerely, Name Last Name General Secretary Encl: Visitor's program FSR-C11001-08-V01
